= `static` Class *jplex.components.calendar.CalendarItem*  =

== Description ==
Item representing one cell of the calendar (i.e. one day)
Store the corresponding HTML element and date and handle focus and select events.


== Properties ==         
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||



== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `check()` || `bool` || Check whether the date of the item match a valid date or not<br/>(regarding to the valid range set in the calendar configuration)<br /> ||
|| `focus()` || `void` || Set the focus on the item<br /> ||
|| `getCell()` || `Element` || Get the cell (td) element representing the item<br /> ||
|| `getDate()` || `Date` || Get the date of the item<br /> ||
|| `getIndex()` || `Integer` || Get the index of the item in the table<br /> ||
|| `select(e, click)` || `void` || Selects the date corresponding to the item<br />  - `e <Event>`<br/> - `click <bool>` true if the selection results from a click on the cell<br/>||
